pointtool.add:
Add points anywhere. 
Please touch the place you want to add.
pointtool.add_location:
Add a point to your current location. 
Turn on GPS and touch the screen.
pointtool.move:
Move point. 
Please press and hold the point.

home_btn.gps:
Turn on GPS. 
Press it again to switch off GPS, follow your current location, and jump.

layers_btn.import: Import GeoJSON, GPX, KML, KMZ files.

tutrials.termsOfUse: Do you agree to the terms of use and start?

maps_btn.online:
Switch to offline mode. 
Maps are loaded from cache.
maps_btn.offline:
Switch to online mode. 
Maps are loaded from the net.

tutrials.selectiontool:
Drag to select features. 
Selected features can be edited with tools.
tutrials.infotool:
Display feature information. 
Please touch the feature.

linetool.plot:
Create a line in your plot. 
A node is added where you touched. 
Touch the start point to finish editing the line. 
Touch the line to resume editing.

polygontool.plot:
Create a polygon in your plot. 
A node is added where you touched. 
Touch the start point to finish editing the polygon. 
Touch the polygon to resume editing.

tutrials.pencilmode: Use a pen to draw. A finger touch will move.

confirm.deleteData: Do you want to delete the data?

confirm.downloadPhoto: Do you want to download photos?

confirm.gotoBack: Do you want to discard your changes?
confirm.close: Do you want to discard your changes?
confirm.copyData: Do you want to copy the data?

common.label: label
common.name: name
common.gps_settings_disabled: Cannot be set when GPS is on
common.gps_settings_alert: The settings will be reflected when GPS starts up.

maplisturl.info: Input the URL of the map settings list.

file_save.info: Save the current data and settings to the file in ecorismap format.

file_open.info: Load the saved data and settings from the ecorismap format file.

mapcachedelete.info: Clear map cache and download files.

apriclear.info:
Reset the app to its initial state. 
All data and settings in the device will be reset.

manual.info: Display the online manual and terms of use.

confirm.saveDataToLocalStorage:
Do you want to save the current data and settings? 
Previously saved data will be overwritten.
confirm.clearLocalStorage:
Initialize? 
All data and settings will be reset.
confirm.clearTileCache: Clear map cache and download files?
confirm.fileOpen:
Load data file (.ecorismap)? 
Current data and settings will be overwritten.

version.info:
Current version. 
You can check the change history.

OSSLicense.info: Displays the open source license used in this software.

pdf_save.info: Output the current map and data to pdf.

gps_settings.info:
Change GPS accuracy. 
It also affects battery consumption.

Purchases.title: Apply for upgrade (paid plan)
Purchases.confirmCheck: I have confirmed the following notes.
Purchases.errorMessage2: Please try again due to a communication error.
Purchases.applicationChange: Click here to confirm application information, issue receipts, change plans, and cancel

placeholder.newPassword: After change (6 or more single-byte alphanumers)
placeholder.password: password (6 or more single-byte alphanumerical characters)

alert.activate: Please check your email and activate.
alert.resetPassword: Please check your email and reset your password.
alert.registEncryptKey: To log in, please register your encryption key.
alert.FailResetEncryptKey: Failed to reset the encryption key.

alert.FailRegistEncryptPassword: Failed to register the encryption key.

account_edit.info: Change the display name and icon image.

password_change.info: Change the login password for your account.

encryption_password_change.info:
The password used for encryption. 
You will need it to log in with another device. 
You will also need it when you reinstall the app.

encryption_key_reset.info: If you lose your smartphone, reset the encryption key from your browser to protect your data.

account_delete.info:
Delete the account. 
All projects owned by you will also be deleted.

upgrade.info: You can increase the number of projects and members that can be added.

project_import.info:
Import the data and settings exported from the project. 
The user information in the data will be reset.

project_delete_all.info: Erase all data in your own project.
